title: Pre-Socialization MOOC for Online Higher Education Adaptation: Foundations of Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital competencies with no online learning experience
context.additional_context: Program supporting adult learners preparing for university entrance by addressing psychological barriers to online learning environments and fostering learning community formation

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more fundamental learning strategies required in online higher education environments
Learners achieve over 80% participation rates by practicing interaction methods with peers in virtual discussion forums
Learners create and submit a time management and study-life balance plan
Learners can utilize five or more basic functions of online learning platforms (Zoom, LMS)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
